DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate efficacy atorvastatin 80 mg daily compare atorvastatin 10 mg daily reduce C-reactive protein level 26-week treatment period subject document coronary artery disease .
DOC.criteria: Male female subject age majority < 80 year Subjects LDLC > 0.5 g/L ( 1.29 mmol/L ) < 1.5 g/L ( 3.87 mmol/L ) , TG < 4.00 g/L ( 4.56 mmol/L ) hsCRP > 1.5 mg/L < 15 mg/L Subjects document coronary artery disease . Female subject childbearing potential without contraception Subjects secondary hyperlipidemia Diabetic subject receive insulin Subjects contraindication statin therapy .
